Articles.Content: So, we all know that struts are vital in most relatively big aircraft/rockets. Maybe if a welding tool was added we could weld parts together? But instead of making it too easy, the welded parts could have a certain weight/pressure limit before breaking.

Hi @i like turtles, and welcome to the forums.

You may well find with the new 'Autostrut' and 'Rigid Joint' features (coming with 1.2) that a 'welding' option may not be needed so much, as they provide a mixture of different ways to stop your vessels being so floppy.
